channel.title: How do i lock my server ip to my client?
channel.description: How do i lock my server ip to my client so they cant change it and please explain as much as you can DONT SAYS SEARCH BAR or ill report spamming now please thankyou for your help

item.title: How do i lock my server ip to my client?
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

sonsofgod2:

How do i lock my server ip to my client so they cant change it and please explain as much as you can DONT SAYS SEARCH BAR or ill report spamming now please thankyou for your help

serverip"
Search for something lyk that, you’ll see serverip"kfkfkf.no-ip.biz" (thats not a real server lol) and then change it to yours. CLIENT.java. If you mean lyk so they cant click enter and change, you may wanna google that. iunno sowwy.

item.title: How do i lock my server ip to my client?

@Mod_Whip wrote:

You’ll have to remove the part where it has the place where you enter the ip, then have it connect to your ip instead of what the person entered.
